title: Global brokerage firms see 14-38% upside in HDFC Bank post Q3 results
description: Leading brokerages have expressed optimism about HDFC Bank, issuing a mix of positive ratings and price targets that reflect its strong growth potential for the next 12 months.HDFC Bank, on Wednesday reported a 2.2% year-on-year growth in its December quarter standalone net profit, totaling Rs 16,736 crore, compared to Rs 16,373 crore posted in the same period last year.Also Read: HDFC Bank Q3 Results: PAT rises 2% YoY to Rs 16,736 crore, NII advances 8%​

html:
Jan 24, 2025, 11:06:07 AM IST

Leading brokerages have expressed optimism about HDFC Bank, issuing a mix of positive ratings and price targets that reflect its strong growth potential for the next 12 months.

HDFC Bank, on Wednesday reported a 2.2% year-on-year growth in its December quarter standalone net profit, totaling Rs 16,736 crore, compared to Rs 16,373 crore posted in the same period last year.
Also Read: HDFC Bank Q3 Results: PAT rises 2% YoY to Rs 16,736 crore, NII advances 8%​

ETMarkets.com

2/6

Macquarie on HDFC Bank

Buy | Target Rs 2,300 | LTP Rs 1,665 | Upside 38%

Macquarie has issued a Buy rating on HDFC Bank, setting a target price of Rs 2,300. This reflects a significant upside potential of 38% from the current market price of Rs 1,665.

ETMarkets.com

3/6

Morgan Stanley on HDFC Bank

Overweight | Target Rs 1,975 | LTP Rs 1,665 | Upside 18%

Morgan Stanley has maintained an Overweight rating on HDFC Bank, with a target price of Rs 1,975. This indicates a potential upside of 18% from the current market price of Rs 1,665.

Reuters

Buy | Target Rs 1,900| LTP Rs 1,665 | Upside 14%

IIFL has assigned a Buy rating to HDFC Bank, with a target price of Rs 1,900. This suggests a potential upside of 14% from the current market price of Rs 1,665.

ANI

BofA on HDFC Bank: Buy | Target Rs 2,020 | LTP Rs 1,665 | Upside 21%

BofA has issued a Buy rating on HDFC Bank, setting a target price of Rs 2,020. This implies a potential upside of 21% from the current market price of Rs 1,665.

Reuters

Buy | Target Rs 1,950 | LTP Rs 1,665 | Upside 17%

Nuvama has assigned a Buy rating to HDFC Bank, with a target price of Rs 1,950. This indicates a potential upside of 17% from the current market price of Rs 1,665.

(Disclaimer: Recommendations, suggestions, views, and opinions given by experts are their own. These do not represent the views of the Economic Times)

ETMarkets.com
